title: Crush to Judgment: HEREDITARY
itunes:title: Crush to Judgment: HEREDITARY
description:
Chuck and Noel both saw Hereditary last week and felt the need to sit down and have therapy about the movie that Noel said "hurt his feelings." It's a new horror masterpiece, so listen in as they disect this very disturbing film. LOTS OF SPOILERS!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
